titles.title: A concurrent resolution commending the Hugh O' Brian Youth Foundation on the thirtieth anniversary of its founding.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 6/28/1988--Introduced. Commends a named youth foundation on the 30th anniversary of its founding.
